column4: hey yall ...im having trouble with FTP ...if I ftp from the command line it takes forever to download a file (im talking like 8 min for a 4 kilobyte file) but if I use filezilla it is instantanious ...was wondering if any one could help ?
i was going to post in the fourms  but I figured i would come here first as it mentioned on the website
it should be the same, an ftp client is just a front-end for the commands
